Public Advocate - Citywide
                             Republican   Eric A. Ulrich                       133-46 Hawtree Creek Road South Ozone Park, NY 11420                                                                                       Pursuant to the Commissioners’
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          policy, reaffirmed at their April 2,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2019 meeting, the following
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          election documents for the June
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2019 Primary, which were filed after
                                                                                                                                                                                                                         5pm on Monday, April 1, 2019 are
